mapper.update: update TB_PRODUCT set F_PRODUCTNAME = #{F_PRODUCTNAME}, F_PRODUCTDESC = #{F_PRODUCTDESC}, F_PRICE = #{F_PRICE}, F_CLSID = #{F_CLSID}, F_ISSPECIAL = #{F_ISSPECIAL} where F_PRODUCT_ID = #{F_PRODUCT_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, (select F_ClsName From tb_class tc where tc.F_ClsId = tbproduct.F_CLSID)as F_CLSNAME, (select PATH From tb_pictures tbpictures where tbpictures.PICTURES_ID = tbproduct.F_ProductPic) AS PATH FROM TB_PRODUCT tbproduct WHERE F_PRODUCT_ID = #{F_PRODUCT_ID}

select F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, tbpictures.PATH as PATH from TB_PRODUCT tbproduct,TB_PICTURES tbpictures where tbproduct.F_ProductPic = tbpictures.PICTURES_ID AND F_CLSID = #{pd.F_ClsId}

select F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, tb_pictures.PATH as F_PATH from tb_product inner join tb_pictures on TB_PRODUCT.F_ProductPic=tb_pictures.PICTURES_ID where F_Status = 0 order by F_Degree desc limit 0,3

select a.F_PRODUCTNAME, a.F_PRODUCTDESC, a.F_PRICE, a.F_CLSID, a.F_ISSPECIAL, a.F_PRODUCT_ID from TB_PRODUCT a where 1=1
and ( a.F_ProductName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_ProductDesc LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_Price LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') )

SELECT tm.* FROM( tb_user tu INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur ON tu.F_USER_ID = tur.F_USER_ID INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tur.F_ROLE_ID = tr.F_ROLE_ID INNER JOIN tb_role_menu trm ON tr.F_ROLE_ID = trm.F_ROLE_ID INNER JOIN tb_menu tm ON trm.F_MENU_ID = tm.F_MENU_ID ) where tm.F_STATUS='1' and tu.F_USER_ID=#{F_USER_ID}
